name: LOGO Mastermind
overview: LOGO Mastermind is version of the popular logic game Mastermind, published in the C64 Magazine PowerPlay as a type-in tutor for LOGO.. You try to figure out a secret code made up of several unknown characters. You get to specify the number of characters in the code from two to six. You also get to set the number of possible letters that could be selected for any individual character in the code up to eleven. For example, if you set the code to five characters and the possible letters to nine, you would try to crack a code sequence like XXXXX where any of the X's could be one of the letters from A to I. IN addition to being published in Commodore Power/Play Vol.4 N.2 (April/May 1985), it was also published in Loadstar #011.
